images/jwst-jupiter-2color-2022-07-27_64.name: Jupiter from the Webb Space Telescope
images/jwst-jupiter-2color-2022-07-27_64.description: Webb NIRCam composite image of Jupiter from three filters – F360M (red), F212N (yellow-green), and F150W2 (cyan) – and alignment due to the planet’s rotation.
images/jwst-jupiter-2color-2022-07-27_64.copyright: Image Credit: NASA, ESA, CSA, Jupiter ERS Team; Processing: Ricardo Hueso (UPV/EHU) & Judy Schmidt
